posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rob
Asking $235 shipped and insured.  Prefer check but paypal alright too.  I'll be at work today, so first email when I check my email tonight that says "I'll take it" gets it.  Also open to offers or trades for M101-2s, other T206s, T204s, postcards, supplements, photos, memorabilia, other stuff.

Sorry for bad pictures, no scanner [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/sad.gif[/IMG]

Thanks,
Rob
